titleStmt.title: The Quakers address to the House of Commons declaring their suffering case, relating to oathes and swearing, as it was pesented by George Whitehead, Capt. William Mead, and other eminent Quakers on Friday last, the 12th instant.
titleStmt.author: Whitehead, George, 1636?-1723.
Mead, William, 1628-1713.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
